import JobListings from'./JobListings';// Import JobListings component
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[jobs,setJobs]=useState([]);const[stats,setStats]=useState({totalJobs:0,activeJobs:0,completedJobs:0});// Fetch jobs from the backend
